revision.text: Possibly: A view of the British empire, more especially Scotland; with some proposals for the improvement of that country, the extension of its fisheries, and the relief of the people. By John Knox. (London : Printed for J. Walter, at Charing-Cross ; J. Sewell, in Cornhill ; and W. Gordon, Edinburgh, MDCCLXXXIV. [1784]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2047473~S1
